activities: Westinghouse designs and manufactures nuclear power plants, manufactures nuclear fuel, and provides services to nuclear plants worldwide.  Westinghouse has several offices in the EU.  Westinghouse imports human resources information and other personal data from its EU affiliates relating to its Europe-based employees, workers, and contractors, and processes their personal data for the purposes of human resources administration and management, including benefits and compensation; travel arrangements; security; expense reimbursement; administration and financial planning; development and training; staffing; performance evaluations; talent management and succession planning; intracompany and intercompany communications; relocation services; visa compliance; health and safety, including environmental hazards and exposure; regulatory compliance and investigations; disciplinary matters; corporate mergers and/or acquisitions; and to comply with appropriate legal requests, including litigation.
eucountries: Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, France, Germany, Italy, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Manually Processed Data, Human Resources Data, Employee data
